title: Update system.memory to 4.0.1.2 & 4.5.5

nodes.body:
Surprised no one commented here yet, but this seems to have some ramifications elsewhere in the ecosystem. I just hit a build error due to it effecting Uno (trying to build a branch which ran fine a couple months ago). See SO thread here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/73399777/azure-build-failing-due-to-method-not-found-system-readonlyspan1char-micros

Which points also to https://github.com/T4MVC/R4MVC/issues/172 and then for Uno here: https://github.com/unoplatform/uno/issues/9297
